ISSUE.TITLE: how to clear the log console
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Is there a command to clear the log console directly from the CLI (or from the online dashboard), in order to lighten the weight for my OSS project?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [now-build-utils] Add option to skip download + yarn mutex (#700) * dontDownload in Meta * yarn --mutex network * dontDownload -> skipDownload
